name: Additional Party Members Set / 追加パーティメンバーセット/追加隊伍成員套組 / Personnages jouables additionnels
detailed_description:
In the Additional Party Members Set, you can explore the 2D-world with three additional Neptunia cast members, including IF, Compa, and Artisan! Alongside the new party members, each character comes with their own set of weapons/accessories that can be purchased at Armor Shops at various cities. These items for each character includes:

Artisan Weapons
• Filbert
• Sumi
• Hake
• Stencil
• Liner
• Egbert

Artisan Accessories
• Disruption Earring
• Disruption Crown
• Disruption Scarf
• Disruption Necklace
• Disruption Belt
• Disruption Pin
• Disruption Ribbon

IF Weapons
• Chaos
• Spectral Katar
• Agarest
• Fencer Katar
• Cross Edge
• Trinity
• Dark Rose Katar
• Moero
• Sorcery Katar
• Trillion Destruction

IF Accessories
• Rogue Earring
• Rogue Crown
• Rogue Scarf
• Rogue Necklace
• Rogue Belt

Compa Weapons
• Small Shot
• Medium Shot
• Big Shot
• Prevention Shot
• Heavy Shot
• Toxic Shot
• Mixed Shot
• Altered Shot
• Energy Shot
• Total Shot

Compa Accessories
• Medical Earring
• Medical Crown
• Medical Scarf
• Medical Necklace
• Medical Belt

*Note: Weapons are visible during battle and cutscenes. Bracelets and Accessories are not visible on the character during battle.

short_description: The Additional Party Members Set brings IF, Compa, and Artisan into your party!

fullgame.name: Super Neptunia RPG / 勇者ネプテューヌ /勇者戰機少女

supported_languages:
English*, French, Japanese*, Traditional Chinese
*languages with full audio support

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7, 32bit, 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 2.3GHz or AMD A9 2.9GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: ATI Mobility Radeon HD 5xxx, 1GB VRAM 5000
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Windows 10 64bit (DirectX 12 equivalent)
  • Processor: Intel i5 3.3GHz or AMD FX-8350 4.0GHz equivalent
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 960、ATI Mobility Radeon R9 290
  • Sound Card: DirectSound (DirectX) compatible sound card
